issue.title: [GLib] Use "field" for struct data type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4085](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4085). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because C++ API is changed to use "field" by ARROW-3545.

comments.body:
